methods.name: assemble
javadoc: Returns an Item that is the result of this recipe

methods.name: canCraftInDimensions
javadoc: Used to determine if this recipe can fit in a grid of the given width/height

methods.name: getResultItem
javadoc: Get the result of this recipe, usually for display purposes (e.g. recipe book). If your recipe has more than one possible result (e.g. it's dynamic and depends on its inputs), then return an empty stack.

methods.name: matches
javadoc: Used to check if a recipe matches current crafting inventory
